DOC.brief_summary: This study assess relative bioavailability palbociclib hard gelatin capsule formulation ( API 41 micrometer dissolution Level 1 ) palbociclib hard gelatin capsule formulation ( API 16 micrometer dissolution Level 2 ) compare palbociclib hard gelatin capsule formulation ( API 16 micrometer dissolution Level 1 ) single 125 mg oral dos feed condition healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject and/or female subject physical possibility get pregnant . Evidence personally sign date informed consent document indicate subject ( legal representative ) inform pertinent aspect study . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 7 drinks/week female 14 drinks/week male ( 1 drink = 5 ounce ( 150 mL ) wine 12 ounce ( 360 mL ) beer 1.5 ounce ( 45 mL ) hard liquor ) within 6 month Screening . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day ( determined local requirement , whichever long ) precede first dose study medication . Pregnant female ; breastfeed female ; females physical possibility get pregnant .
